translations: n.叮当声；节拍十分规则的简单诗歌
v.（使）叮当作响；具有简单而又引人注意的韵律

sentences.sentence: Do not let your bracelets jingle when you lead him in.
sentences.translation: 你领他进来的时候，不要让你的手镯叮当作响。

sentences.sentence: They had this little jingle out there, just a little bit of this.
sentences.translation: 他们外面有这个小叮当声，只有一点点这个声音。

sentences.sentence: Outside, Sucre hears the jingle of keys as C.O. Stolte makes his rounds.
sentences.translation: 外面，苏克雷听到一阵钥匙的叮当声，狱警斯托尔特在巡逻。
